_description: Theme Configuration - Controls all colors, visual effects, and styling throughout the app. Changes take effect after page reload.
_colors_info: All colors can be hex (#0a0a0f), rgb (rgb(10,10,15)), rgba (rgba(10,10,15,0.95)), or named colors (black, white, red, etc.)

colors._background: Main background color for the entire app. Used: App background, button backgrounds
colors._backgroundVideo: Background for video player areas (pure black for better contrast). Used: Crossfader track, video containers
colors._deckA: Deck A accent color (cyan/blue). Used: Future deck labeling
colors._deckB: Deck B accent color (red/pink). Used: Future deck labeling
colors._textPrimary: Primary text color (white). Used: Main text, headings, high-contrast text
colors._textMuted: Muted/secondary text color (gray). Used: Disabled text, secondary information
colors._textLabel: Label text color (lighter gray). Used: Button labels, mini button numbers, crossfader labels
colors._borderActive: Active border color (bright blue). Used: Mini buttons with video loaded, crossfader thumb and fill
colors._borderInactive: Inactive border color (dark gray). Used: Empty mini buttons, fader backgrounds, center mark
colors._borderEdit: Edit mode border color (orange). Used: Mini button border when in edit mode
colors._surfaceBase: Base surface color (very subtle white overlay). Used: Subtle backgrounds, overlays
colors._surfaceHover: Hover surface color (slightly brighter overlay). Used: Interactive elements on hover
colors._overlayDark: Dark overlay for modals/popups. Used: Modal backgrounds, overlay dialogs
colors._overlayBlack: Black overlay with transparency. Used: Dimmed backgrounds, shadow overlays

_gradients_info: Color gradients used in the app. Each gradient has: type (linear/radial), angle (degrees: 0=up, 90=right, 135=diagonal), stops (colors with positions 0-100)

gradients._tapToLoad: Gradient for the TAP TO LOAD button. Purple-blue gradient at 135Â° diagonal

effects._borderRadius_info: Rounded corner values in pixels, or 50% for perfect circles

borderRadius._large: More rounded (12px). Used: Tap to Load button

effects._blur_info: Backdrop blur values in pixels. Higher = more blur
effects._shadow_info: Box shadow effects. Format: 'offsetX offsetY blur spread color'. Example: 0 4px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.3) means 4px down, 12px blur, 30% black

shadow._button: Drop shadow for the Tap to Load button

_borders_info: Border width values in pixels. Higher numbers = thicker borders

borders._normal: Standard border (2px). Used: Mini buttons in normal state
borders._thick: Thick border (4px). Used: Mini buttons in edit mode
